item.title: Complete Online Marketing & Advertising Course
item.description: In This Online Course You Will Learn The RIGHT Way To Do Online Marketing & Advertising. This Course Covers ALL The Major Online Advertising Methods … Giving You Step-By-Step Instructions And A Great Overview Of Online Advertising. Learning These Key Skills & Techniques Can Help You Be Massively Successful As You Do Online Marketing & Advertising. Once You Can Master Online Marketing & Advertising … Your Income Potential Is Limitless!

item.title: Amazon PPC Masterclass - The Ultimate PPC Guide
item.description: Are you struggling with Amazon's Sponsored Products ads but don't know where to start? Do your existing PPC campaigns get high aCos and/or low sales volume?  Then this course is designed for you! I will show you the biggest mistakes I see when using Amazon's Sponsored Products and teach you how to properly set up and optimise and create your campaigns. After years of testing and spending literally tens of thousands of dollars I've discovered highly profitable Amazon PPC campaigns that have gone on to generate tens of thousands of dollars in sales and PROFIT.
